text: plasma is the fourth state of matter
atoms and normal matter have a nucleus
with orbiting electrons in plasma the
atoms have been torn apart and the
electrons ripped away here on earth were
familiar with the three main states of
matter that were taught in school solids
liquids and gases you know we have the
atmosphere as a gas the oceans or water
the ground that I stand on is solid but
in fact most of the universe including
stars consists of plasma compared to the
rest of the universe
earth is a calm place most of the time
it's not hot or violent enough here to
create plasma the best place to witness
the power of plasma on earth is inside a
lightning strike
temperatures inside a bolt can reach
fifty three thousand degrees Fahrenheit
enough to momentarily rip a few atoms
apart the plasma lasts an instant then
the electrons rebind and it's gone
but in our massive Sun the plasma lasts
for billions of years and makes up the
entire 200,000 mile deep radiation zone
